title: @Riot Can We Get A Range Indicator For Zed's W?
body: I would really like a range indicator for Zed's W (like Lee Sin's Q)  so when you activate the W there will be a range indicator telling you how close you need to be to switch places with your shadow.  I think this would be an amazing little change that would help a lot of Zed players. :)

replies.body: It already exists. You have a little arrow pointing to your shadow, I believe when it turns red, you've left range.

I know, but for better clarity I think a ring around the shadow would be much better.
Thank you for your comment. :)
Just go in a custom match and test it's borders, than you'll have a good idea of it's radius
I have a pretty good idea of his W's radius its just when I'm in the middle of teamfight I usually don't quite remember the range of my shadow, so I still think a ring would add a lot of clarity.
